title: Story: Quality & Polish
description:
Add testing and audit trail improvements for production readiness.

## Goal
Improve test coverage and event logging for better quality and observability.

## Tasks
- Add event logging for transitive reduction fixes
- Add property-based tests for short hash resolution

## Success Criteria
- Transitive reduction fixes logged in event stream
- Property-based tests cover short hash edge cases
- 100% test coverage for dependency validation

## Benefits
- Better audit trail for automatic fixes
- Increased confidence in short hash resolution
- Improved test coverage for graph operations
